column9: Had started having trouble with insomnia and anxiety at bedtime. I began taking this supplement and have had wonderful, restful sleep. Puts me to sleep within 30-45 minutes and I stay asleep all night. I would recommend it to anyone.

column2: Phyllis, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have used Valerian Root for 15 years for pain releif in my joints and back, headaches and for a restful sleep. I use capsule 500mg so I do not smell the strong fragrance. I take one during the day and 1 to 2 at night before going to bed. Fantastic and wonderful Valerian Root

column2: jruss1969, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I have used valerian for help with sleep and tremors.  It has been effective for both.  Use it for sleep in combination with melatonin and the two together help me go to sleep and stay asleep.

column2: Lastcaress, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I started taking this supplement because I was tired of using Ativan to sleep and for anxiety. I have found that it works better, non-addictive, no horrible side effects, and I feel great. It does smell horrible, but I would take any day over using an addictive medication.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: Helps enormously with getting me to sleep.  Not great at keeping me asleep for more than 3-4 hours, though. No drowsiness when I get up, in comparison with other preparations, so it's the only one I take.

column2: yorkiemom, 55-64 Female  (Caregiver)
column9: I do shift work .I have had trouble with insomnia most of my adult life. Tried everything out there ,from herbs to benzo's.This herb helps me fall asleep faster ,stay asleep longer and I awake with no side effects at all. No memory loss.Best discovery ever.

column2: Tom, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I'm a 58 year old male. I have used valerian root for several months. I get up everynight to go to the restroom. I used to be unable to get back to sleep. Since I have been using valerian I'm always able to return to sleep immediately. I have not noticed any side effects. The product does have a peculiar odor but it is tolerable. I would recommend this product to anyone who has sleep difficulties.
